plot: Ignored by his alcoholic parents, Jimmy Wilson starts hanging around with some shady characters. After falling in love with a lounge singer, Jimmy tries to impress her by doing jobs for her shady boss. After one of these jobs goes bad, Jimmy ends up on the run. Eventually, he must confront the truth, his past, and his parents.
title: I Accuse My Parents
plot_es: Ignored by his alcoholic parents, Jimmy Wilson starts hanging around with some shady characters.
